document_name: Decree No. 2016-0006 P-RM 15 January 2016 establishing the National Mechanism for Early Warning and Response to Security Risks
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/MLI/2016/MLI-2016-01-15-Decree No. 2016-0006 P-RM 15 January 2016 establishing the National Mechanism for Early Warning and Response to Security Risks_5fb29229a85258b2678c871da16a3d8b.pdf
document_description: This decree institutes with the Prime Minister a National mechanism of Early Warning and Security Risk Response. One of the missions of mechanism team is to monitor threats related to climate change and natural disasters. The decree further discusses the administrative organisation of the mechanism.
